attributes.action: Change the mortgage structure from a credit rating to payment of rent history
attributes.additional_details: Many of us in privately rented accommodation that pay our 'high' rent demands on time every month in full are paying a lot more to a lot of people with a mortgage, which therefore makes it impossible to save for a deposit. Why not change the way you are assessed for a mortgage on how good a payer you have been with your rent over a period of time?
attributes.background: Please sign to change the way in which mortgages are given. You currently need a good credit rating and good earnings for a mortgage. Yet theres no limit on rent demands as opposed to earnings.

rejection.details:
The Financial Conduct Authority, which is independent, has overall responsibility for mortgage lending practice. You can contact the FCA here:

https://www.fca.org.uk/contact
